page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content:
Generally, a mixture of private & public provision. {1.CLUNY SQUARE This is a rectangular area of grassland surrounded by shops, flats and houses.It is primarily an adventure playground with a slide, climbing frame, spiders web, steam roller and swings. This is a public playground.
{2.FRANCIS SPORTS CENTRE This centre is divided into two parts, the Hall and the floodlit area which is private and a playing field which is public. The sports hall provides for a large variety of sports, badminton, karate, hockey, netball, table-tennis, snooker and gymnastics. The floodlit area is used for tennis, football and hockey. { continued
